name: Noah Stetzer
bio: Noah Stetzer is the poetry editor at A&U Magazine: America’s AIDS Magazine and an associate editor at Bull City Press. He is the author of Because I Can See Needing a Knife (Red Bird Chapbooks, 2016), and his poems have appeared in the New England Review, Bellevue Literary Review, and Vinyl. Born and raised in Pittsburgh, he now lives in the Washington, DC area.
